import React from "react"; import { secondsToDuration, minutesToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; function TimeMachine(props) { const {minutesToDuration, focusDuration, decreaseFocus, isTimerRunning, } = props; return (
Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(focusDuration)}
Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(breakDuration)}
); } export default TimeMachine
